properties.name: spring.cloud.discovery.reactive.enabled
properties.description: Disabling 'service discovery' for reactive clients - using DNS from AKS.

properties.name: external.services.common.timeout.connect
properties.description: Value in milliseconds setting a connection timeout when calling external API.

properties.name: external.services.common.timeout.read
properties.description: Value in milliseconds setting a read timeout when calling external API.

properties.name: external.services.common.ssl.keystore-location
properties.description: Location to key store where base LH CA cert is stored.

properties.name: external.services.common.ssl.keystore-password
properties.description: Password to key store where base LH CA cert is stored.
